name: Pangea Enigmo 2 Custom Game File
summary: Learn about .E2GM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When saving from a custom game, the resulting file stores all of the custom game data, allowing the custom puzzle to be played even if the E2GM file is deleted.
Custom games can be created by selecting Edit Custom Game â†’ Create New from the Enigmo 2 main menu.
